sentences.en: And it has an enviable presence in emerging markets.
sentences.cn: 花旗在新兴市场还拥有令人羡慕的地位.

sentences.en: Being so beautiful and successful she is really an enviable woman.
sentences.cn: 她长得那样漂亮,在事业上又那样成功,实在令人羡慕.

sentences.en: Britain has an enviable record on breast screening for cancer.
sentences.cn: 英国妇女的乳腺癌患病率很低，着实令人羡慕。

sentences.en: Gold, jewelry, works of art, enviable household furniture, are positive fetters.
sentences.cn: 金银, 首饰, 工艺品, 令人羡慕的家俱都是不可否认的镣铐.

sentences.en: He acquired an enviable reputation for artistic ability.
sentences.cn: 他的艺术才能使他赢得了令人羡慕的声誉.

sentences.en: He acquired an enviable reputation in literary and art circles for his artistic ability.
sentences.cn: 他的艺术才能使他蜚声文艺界.

sentences.en: He is in the enviable position of having two job offers to choose from.
sentences.cn: 他有两份工作可选，真让人羡慕。

sentences.en: His position at the business was less enviable than theirs.
sentences.cn: 他在公司的地位还不如他们的更令人艳羡的.

sentences.en: It's rich , enviable beauty in a box Brush included.
sentences.cn: 这是一款可以制造美丽的华丽而又让人欣羡的盒子!

sentences.en: Now he was in the enviable position of not having to work for a living.
sentences.cn: 现在他已不必为生计而工作，着实令人羡慕。

sentences.en: Perfect health was Shirley's enviable portion.
sentences.cn: 无病无痛,身体健康就是谢利叫人羡慕的地方.

sentences.en: She has built up an enviable reputation as a harpist.
sentences.cn: 她已经成为一名颇有名望的竖琴演奏家.

sentences.en: She is a woman of enviable beauty.
Synthetic vitamins have established an enviable record in purity of product.
sentences.cn: 合成维生素在产品纯度方面已证实具有出色的记录.

sentences.en: They have enviable reputations as athletes.
sentences.cn: 作为运动员，他们的声望令人羡慕。

sentences.en: This conservatory enjoys an enviable position overlooking a leafy expanse.
sentences.cn: 这个温室位置绝佳，放眼望去，草木繁茂，郁郁葱葱。

words.tran_cn: 引起妒忌的,值得羡慕的

trans.tran_cn: 值得羡慕的，引起妒忌的
trans.tran_en: an enviable quality, position, or possession is good and other people would like to have it
